data.persona: I was once dead.  I have come to life. I am feared by children.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance to church.
The entrance to the church can only be described as a bit scary.  It is overgrown with mosses and weeds.  It has not been taken care of and is a mixture of wood and stone.  It is dirty, and things live here.
There's a statue, a weed, a ghost, a Gravestone, and a moss here.
The ghost is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a shirt, and wielding a leg.

data.short_motivation: I want to befriend the ghost
data.mid_motivation: I want to have the ghost scare a peasant family out of their home
data.long_motivation: I want to move into the peasant family's home and live a peaceful life protected from villagers who'd harm me for being undead
